meanings.definition: The quality or state of being svelte.
meanings.sent1: Her sveltenesses caught everyone's attention at the fashion show.
meanings.sent2: The ballerina moved with sveltenesses across the stage.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to mimic the sveltenesses of the elegant swan.
meanings.sent4: The sveltenesses of the gazelle as it leaped through the grass was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The sveltenesses of the model's figure made her stand out on the runway.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being slender and graceful.
meanings.sent1: The actress's sveltenesses made her perfect for the role of the elegant queen.
meanings.sent2: The dancer's sveltenesses were admired by all who watched her perform.
meanings.sent3: The tree swayed in the wind with the sveltenesses of a ballet dancer.
meanings.sent4: Her sveltenesses in handling difficult situations impressed her colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The swan glided across the lake with unmatched sveltenesses.
